name: Elemental Mania - Art Demo
description:
Built for the Bored Pixels Game Jam 2021.

This is purely an art demo showcasing my background assets, sprites, and main menu artwork. It's held together with tooth picks. It is as beautiful as it is unlikely.

Music by alkamistnz  (featured on the main menu and the main 'game')

Teammates:
EquippedHats, ShortLearner and Boy
